has research problem.from sentence: Convolutional Neural Network Architectures for Matching Natural Language Sentences
Semantic matching is of central importance to many natural language tasks [ 2,28 ] .

has research problem: Matching two potentially heterogenous language objects

has research problem.from sentence: Matching two potentially heterogenous language objects is central to many natural language applications .
A successful sentence - matching algorithm therefore needs to capture not only the internal structures of sentences but also the rich patterns in their interactions .
